title: Nikolas Cruz: The violent path of a teenage killer
description: A scrollytelling story of the Parkland, Florida school shooter's disciplinary history.

title: Parkland Change Tracker
description: Interactive tracker showing changes since the Parkland school shooting via data from Google Sheets.

title: Fort Lauderdale crime map
description: Mapped incidentss from the city's crime API, updating daily via a script on Amazon Lambda.

title: 2018 Voter Guide
description: A Flask rig that returns a list of candidate profiles in the municipal elections.

title: Doctor Discipline
description: A Django app and python scrapers to compile disciplinary info on Florida doctors.

title: Coastal construction analysis
description: Jupyter Notebook analysis of construction on Florida's coast.

title: INCapitolEdits bot
description: A Twitter bot that watches Wikipedia for edits from Indiana statehouse computers and tweets them out.

title: One Wild Ride
description: A scrollytelling story to animate the writer's bike ride through the height of Florida on a map.

title: Amenities maps
description: Two D3.js mapsshowing how Florida and U.S. counties rank for best scenery and climate according to data released by the USDA.
